titles.title: No other name but the name of Jesus,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
No other name but the name of Jesus,
No other name but the name of the Lord,
No other name but the name of Jesus,
Is worthy of glory,
Is worthy of honour,
Is worthy of power and of praise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
His name is exalted high above the earth,
His name is high above the heavens,
His name is exalted high above the earth,
Give glory and honour and praise
Unto His name.
